attributes.action: Stop the Mosque in Mitcham Town Centre
attributes.additional_details:
there has been planning permission to convert one floor of the old job centre in Mitcham into a Mosque, We the undersigned feel that another mosque in the area will not enhance the dying town centre nor will it create any jobs, it will further kill the town centre which is in great need of regeneration, and there is the need to preserve the small town centre comminuty feel. there is not the parking capacity or the road volume to deal with the large amount of traffic and potential illegal parking

THERE ARE 4 MOSQUES IN THE AREA ALREADY

THIS HAS ALREADY BEEN DENIED PLANNING PERMISSION LETS KEEP IT THAT WAY
